statements.select: select * from OverTime where [EmployeeId]=#empid# and ([DueDate] between #startdate# and #enddate#) order by [DueDate] asc
select * from OverTime where [EmployeeId]=#employeeid# and year(DueDate)=#year# and month(DueDate)=#month# order by [DueDate] asc
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OverTime WHERE EmployeeId = #empid# and year(DueDate)=#year# and month(DueDate)=#month# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OverTime WHERE EmployeeId = #empid# and year(DueDate)=#year# and month(DueDate)=#month# AND InsertTime > #inserttime# ORDER BY InsertTime
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM OverTime WHERE EmployeeId = #empid# and year(DueDate)=#year# and month(DueDate)=#month# AND InsertTime < #inserttime# ORDER BY InsertTime desc
SELECT * FROM OverTime WHERE DueDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OverTime WHERE EmployeeId IN ($empids$) AND year(DueDate) = #year# AND MONTH(DueDate) = #month# AND DAY(DueDate) = #day#
